description: Detects executing python with keywords related to network activity that could indicate a potential reverse shell
author: @d4ns4n_
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Python Reverse Shell
query: (process.executable.text:"*python*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-c\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*import*" AND process.command_line.text:"*pty*" AND process.command_line.text:"*spawn\(*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.connect*")
